EXTRACTED VALUE: This was great, but for me not as good as Hidden. For me it didn't have enough of Anna and Henry in it. But overall a great read.
Evan Cooper was compelling. He was a take charge, get the job done hero. I really enjoyed this story with the pathos, action and suspense.
This book was definitely one of my favorites - I had to buy it for my personal library. I'm sharing it with my best girlfriends.
We are using this book in a small group at our church.
My daughter loved these books so much, she is going to reread them! Great books for Christian girls!
The teenage girls at our church school like the story line, adventure and characters of the Dee Henderson books. They ask for more.
This book held my interest very well and continued the storyline with little tweaks along the way. I hope to read more from this author.
Fantastic book! Very faith challenging. My 17 year old son read it in two days and said it was the best book he's ever read.
